subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Former St. John’s basketball coach Joe Lapchick was a man worth knowing if only because he was held in reverence by Bob Knight and New York sportswriters, two forces not often in agreement on anything.
snippet: Former St. John’s basketball coach Joe Lapchick was a man worth knowing if only because he was held in reverence by Bob Knight and New York sportswriters, two forces not often in agreement on anything.
